::Hot Rod/Jhiaxus/Scorponok-Zarak::
   
  Hot Rod: You sound like you got me already...
   
  Hot Rod fires an optic laser at the arm that hydras is holding around Nightlight. He then turns and launches one of his over-should rockets at Jhiaxus.
   
  The rocket strikes the ground, blowing Jhiaxus back into the swamp. In the dust Hot Rod has jumped aboard Scorponok. Zarak begins to change to his head mode when Hot rod grabs him and sends one good right hand crashing into Zarak's armor. Zarak falls from Scorponok, hitting the ground. He is knocked out and his exo-suit in need of repair. it isn't able to transform. The form of Scorponok, now in robot mode minus the head, falls backwards, crashing into the ground. As it fell Hot Rod had jumped off and was now facing Hydras again. Had he freed Nightlight?
   
  Hot Rod: A few seconds later and two of your troops are out of the fight. What do you got next, Hydras?

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Hydras:

"Surprice???"said with irony the male and added "Well it seems that 
the MAtrix decided to find another bearer, so let's Unicron deal with 
him... Let's talk bout US, old pal... in a safely maner for us... " 
Looking to his ?fellows' " Tied him and jam that comlink also mask 
his signature, I dont want that our party be interrupted"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Hot Rod/Jhiaxus/Scorponok::
> 
> Hot Rod turns towards the voice of his old nemesis. He sees the 
form of his lover help captive. Hot Rod's fist instinct is to take 
aim with his blaster at Hydras. He then sees Trelos join them.
> 
> Hot Rod: Let her go, Hydras! Things have been quiet lately with 
you predacons. Why choose now of all times to cause trouble. Don't 
you realize that Unicron is making his move?!
> 
> The ground behind Hot Rod erupts as Scorponok comes flying out 
from under ground in scorpion mode. Zarak stand on top of the 
scorpion body.
> 
> Zarak: Don't try and talk your way out of this one you old 
Targetmaster!
> 
> Hot Rod is shocked at the voice and half turns so he can see both 
Hydras and Scorponok behind him.
> 
> Hot Rod: Zarak! How are you alive? You should have died centuries 
ago!
> 
> Zarak: My power was far too great for that...
> 
> In the swamp Jhiaxus is seething with anger and hate. The Autobot 
that had caused him pain and his place in the Decepticon Empire was 
before him. His whole reason for coming to this mud ball.
> 
> With careful aim Jhiaxus fires off a single shot that strikes Hot 
Rod's hand. Hot Rod is injured but his hand still functions. His 
blaster is scrap.
> 
> Jhiaxus now slows stomps out of the swamp. In each hand he 
holding large automatic pistols.
> 
> Hot Rod faces Hydras again.
> 
> Hot Rod: What is this?!



                         

       
---------------------------------
